Pre-Game Insights: Both Bangladesh and Pakistan have had inconsistent performances in the tournament and need to improve to qualify for the semi-finals.
Bangladesh's improvement against India, with performances from Litton Das and Mustafizur Rahman, is noted.
Pakistan's middle-order strength and their struggles with Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan are highlighted.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch conditions at Adelaide Oval are favorable for batting, with short square boundaries.
Mustafizur Rahman needs four wickets to reach 100 T20I wickets, and Shadab Khan is five away from the same milestone.
Pakistan has a strong all-rounding unit, including Mohammad Wasim, who has performed well against Bangladesh.
